mapper.select: SELECT MANAGER_ID, NVL(MANAGER_PWD, '') MANAGER_PWD, NVL(MANAGER_NAME, '') MANAGER_NAME, NVL(MANAGER_NICKNAME, '') MANAGER_NICKNAME, NVL(STATUS, 'N') STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(MANAGER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') MANAGER_DATE FROM ST_MANAGER WHERE MANAGER_ID = #{value}

SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) FROM ST_USER
WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE ST_USER SET USER_PWD = #{userPwd}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, USER_TEL = #{userTel}, USER_POINT = #{userPoint}, STATUS = #{status} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(ITEM_SEQ) FROM ST_ITEM_DATA WHERE 1 = 1
AND ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND ITEM_CATE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND ITEM_CODE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

SELECT ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_CATE, ITEM_PRICE, READ_CNT, STOCK, REG_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_CATE, ITEM_PRICE, READ_CNT, STOCK, REG_DATE FROM (SELECT ITEM_SEQ, NVL(ITEM_CODE, '') ITEM_CODE, NVL(ITEM_NAME, '') ITEM_NAME, NVL(ITEM_CATE, '') ITEM_CATE, NVL(ITEM_PRICE, 0) ITEM_PRICE, NVL(READ_CNT, 0) READ_CNT, NVL(STOCK, 0) STOCK, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE FROM ST_ITEM_DATA WHERE 1 = 1
AND ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND ITEM_CATE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND ITEM_CODE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(ITEM_INTRO LIKE, #{searchValue}) > 0
ORDER BY ITEM_SEQ DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT ITEM_SEQ, NVL(ITEM_CODE, '') ITEM_CODE, NVL(ITEM_NAME, '') ITEM_NAME, NVL(ITEM_CATE, '') ITEM_CATE, NVL(ITEM_PRICE, 0) ITEM_PRICE, NVL(ITEM_INTRO, '') ITEM_INTRO, NVL(READ_CNT, 0) READ_CNT, NVL(STOCK, 0) STOCK, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE FROM ST_ITEM_DATA WHERE ITEM_SEQ = #{itemSeq}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_ITEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ST_ITEM_DATA (ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_CATE, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_INTRO, READ_CNT, STOCK, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{itemSeq}, #{itemCode}, #{itemName}, #{itemCate}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemIntro}, 0, #{stock}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE ST_ITEM_DATA SET ITEM_NAME = #{itemName}, ITEM_CATE = #{itemCate}, ITEM_PRICE = #{itemPrice}, ITEM_INTRO = #{itemIntro}, STOCK = #{stock} WHERE ITEM_SEQ = #{itemSeq}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(REBOARD_SEQ) FROM ST_REBOARD WHERE 1 = 1
AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND REBOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND REBOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

SELECT REBOARD_SEQ, ITEM_SEQ, USER_ID, REBOARD_TITLE, REBOARD_CONTENT, REBOARD_READ_CNT, REBOARD_DEL_FLAG, REG_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, REBOARD_SEQ, ITEM_SEQ, USER_ID, REBOARD_TITLE, REBOARD_CONTENT, REBOARD_READ_CNT, REBOARD_DEL_FLAG, REG_DATE FROM (SELECT REBOARD_SEQ, NVL(ITEM_SEQ, 0) ITEM_SEQ, NVL(USER_ID, 0) USER_ID, NVL(REBOARD_TITLE, '') REBOARD_TITLE, NVL(REBOARD_CONTENT, '') REBOARD_CONTENT, NVL(REBOARD_READ_CNT, 0) REBOARD_READ_CNT, NVL(REBOARD_DEL_FLAG, '') REBOARD_DEL_FLAG, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE FROM ST_REBOARD WHERE 1 = 1
AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND REBOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND REBOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY REBOARD_SEQ DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT REBOARD_SEQ, NVL(ITEM_SEQ, 0) ITEM_SEQ, NVL(USER_ID, 0) USER_ID, NVL(REBOARD_TITLE, '') REBOARD_TITLE, NVL(REBOARD_CONTENT, '') REBOARD_CONTENT, NVL(REBOARD_READ_CNT, 0) REBOARD_READ_CNT, NVL(REBOARD_DEL_FLAG, '') REBOARD_DEL_FLAG, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE FROM ST_REBOARD WHERE REBOARD_SEQ = #{value}

SELECT REBOARD_SEQ, REPLY_SEQ, USER_ID, REPLY_GROUP, REPLY_ORDER, REPLY_CONTENT, REG_DATE, STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, REBOARD_SEQ, REPLY_SEQ, USER_ID, REPLY_GROUP, REPLY_ORDER, REPLY_CONTENT, REG_DATE, STATUS FROM (SELECT REBOARD_SEQ, REPLY_SEQ, NVL(USER_ID, '') USER_ID, NVL(REPLY_GROUP, 0) REPLY_GROUP, NVL(REPLY_ORDER, 0) REPLY_ORDER, NVL(REPLY_CONTENT, '') REPLY_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE, NVL(STATUS, 'N') STATUS FROM ST_REBOARD_REPLY WHERE REBOARD_SEQ = #{value} ORDER BY REPLY_GROUP ASC, REPLY_ORDER ASC))

SELECT REBOARD_SEQ, REPLY_SEQ, NVL(USER_ID, '') USER_ID, NVL(REPLY_GROUP, 0) REPLY_GROUP, NVL(REPLY_ORDER, 0) REPLY_ORDER, NVL(REPLY_CONTENT, '') REPLY_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE, NVL(STATUS, 'N') STATUS FROM ST_REBOARD_REPLY WHERE REPLY_SEQ = #{value}

SELECT QNAREPLY_SEQ, QNABOARD_SEQ, MANAGER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT, REG_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, QNAREPLY_SEQ, QNABOARD_SEQ, MANAGER_ID, REPLY_CONTENT, REG_DATE FROM (SELECT QNAREPLY_SEQ, QNABOARD_SEQ, NVL(MANAGER_ID, '') MANAGER_ID, NVL(REPLY_CONTENT, '')REPLY_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE FROM ST_QNA_REPLY WHERE QNABOARD_SEQ = #{value} ORDER BY QNAREPLY_SEQ DESC))
